questions.question: When a fluid flows over a stationary solid surface, the fluid velocity at the fluid – solid interface is?

answers.c: between zero and free – stream velocity

questions.question: The unit of viscosity in CGS system is commonly known as Poise. The dimension of Poise is?
If the equivalent length of a 90° elbow is greater than the 45° elbow, the pressure loss across the 90° elbow is _________ the 45° elbow.
The loss of pressure head for the laminar flow through pipes varies as

answers.d: inverse of the square of velocity

questions.question: Reynolds number is a ratio of

answers.d: average velocity to velocity of sound

questions.question: Two tubes of diameter 1 cm and 2 cm are filled with mercury to a height of 50 cm. The tubes are open to atmosphere. Now pressure at the bottom of the mercury column will be

answers.a: higher for the tube of dia 1 cm
answers.b: higher for the tube of dia 2 cm
answers.c: the same for both the tubes

questions.question: Fannings friction factor for a flow with Reynolds number of 1000 is
